programme.desc: Mengikuti Biba, seekor ikan mullet merah muda, mempunyai buku nota khas. Dia menuliskan impian, harapan, ketakutan, pengalaman dan pengembaraan yang penuh dengan kegembiraan

programme.title: Chronokids Ep16
programme.desc: Kembar Marvin dan Adle menemui telefon bimbit yang dapat meneleport mereka sepanjang masa. Oleh itu, tentu saja, mereka tidak dapat melepaskan peluang untuk memanfaatkan hasil bertuah mereka

programme.title: Cam & Leon Ep06
programme.desc: Cam and Leon adalah dua ekor sesumpah yang penuh perasaan ingin tahu yang tinggal di taman bandar, jauh dari habitat semula jadi mereka.

programme.title: Lesung Vs Blender Ep12
programme.desc: Lesung Vs Blender merupakan program masakan yang menyajikan masakan moden dan tradisional. Terdapat dua elemen utama yang mewakili masakan tersebut iaitu blender dan lesung batu.

programme.title: Masak Ni Senang! Ep07
programme.desc: Program masakan yang mengetengahkan konsep masakan yang mudah tanpa menggunakan dapur untuk memasak. Untuk minggu ini resepinya adalah Tom Yam Nam Khon, Puding Roti Berries dan Sup Ayam Hangat

programme.title: Ha Ha Ha Ep08
programme.desc: Sketsa kali ini merangkumi ragam AJK di mesyuarat bersama Penghulu untuk Hari Keluarga, karenah warga emas di rumah orang tua dengan doktor dan suasana lucu di kelas tuisyen inggeris di kampung

programme.title: Keringat Selebriti 2 Ep09
programme.desc: Memaparkan temubual secara santai antara hos dan selebriti jemputan yang akan menceritakan era zaman kesusahan mereka sehinggalah kini,di mana mereka boleh berbangga dengan pencapaian masing-masing

programme.title: The Deadly Knives
programme.desc: Two lovers who return to announce their marriage plans discover that their families are in conflict over land. Can they mend this broken bond?

programme.title: Kidnap Ding Ding Don
programme.desc: 2015 HKFA Best Supporting Actress & Best New Performer Ivana Wong pairs up with Alex Fong, who plays an amnesiac kidnapper falling for his hostage.

programme.title: Mrs K
programme.desc: Kara Hui makes her action film swansong by portraying a woman who will stop at nothing to protect her husband and daughter when enemies from her past resurface. Simon Yam & Wu Bai co-star.

programme.title: Temporary Family
programme.desc: In order to meet his girlfriend's financial ultimatum, Siu Long decides to flip a penthouse. However, he ends up living with the other three investors when things go south.

programme.title: My Alien Girlfriend
programme.desc: Yuen Qiu, Susan Shaw & Law Kar Ying star in this comedy about Angela, who comes to earth for the first time to look for her brother, who came looking for love. But it is her who finds it in a kind man.

programme.title: All About Ah Long
programme.desc: When Ah Long's ex-girlfriend resurfaces after a 10-year absence to take their son away from him, he must make a painful choice about what is best for the boy.

programme.title: Legend of the Naga Pearls
programme.desc: Starring Darren Wang, Crystal Zhang & Simon Yam, this fantasy adventure film tells of a quest to find magical pearls by a royal descendant of an ancient winged tribe.

programme.title: My Wife is a Superstar
programme.desc: This romantic comedy stars Pakho Chau & Annie Liu in a tale of an actress married to an entertainment reporter, and the conflict their careers cause.

programme.title: House of Flying Daggers
programme.desc: As the Tang Dynasty declines, several rebel groups are established, with the largest being the House of Flying Daggers. Two officers are ordered to kill the elusive leader of the group.

programme.title: Funny Soccer
programme.desc: Lam Chi Chung from Shaolin Soccer delivers another wildly nonsensical Hong Kong comedy with rock singer Shin as a crazy soccer team captain who pushes his team to victory!

programme.title: Default
programme.desc: Based on real-life events, this story features the different happenings in South Korea during the Asian Financial Crisis. Can they overcome the biggest crisis of the country?

programme.title: Cold War 2
programme.desc: Sean Lau, appointed as the Commissioner of Police after the success of the Cold War rescue operation, finds his reign rocked by the abduction of this wife and daughter.

programme.title: Knight of Shadows: Between Yin and Yang
programme.desc: A legendary demon hunter tracks down beasts that enter the human dimension, assisted by a lawman protege and a motley crew of friendly monsters.

programme.title: Duckweed
